channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: UFC 324 live stream: how to watch Gaethje vs Pimblett, start time, preview, full card
item.description: As UFC makes Paramount Plus debut with much-anticipated main event, follow our guide to watch a UFC 324 live stream online from anywhere.

item.title: Hasbro Suit Alleges Overprinted ‘Magic: The Gathering’ Cards
item.description: Accusations of 'gross mismanagement' have been levvied against Hasbro, owing to its ongoing success and production of 'Magic' cards.

item.title: Tech CEOs boast and bicker about AI at Davos
item.description: There were times at this week’s meeting of the World Economic Forum when Davos seemed transformed into a high-powered tech conference.

item.title: I field-tested the best-selling Wandrd PRVKE backpack, and the hype is real — it's my new favorite camera bag that doesn't look like one
item.description: My month-long test of the stylish Wandrd PRVKE V4 camera bag covers the mid-size 21L version.

item.title: Un chasseur d’aurores boréales dévoile comment se préparer pour les prochaines tempêtes solaires et ne rien manquer
item.description: Ce mois de janvier a encore une fois été particulièrement dynamique pour les aurores boréales. Avec l'activité solaire actuelle, ce type de phénomène fascine les scientifiques et le grand public. L'occasion d'apprendre à mieux les « chasser » avec des professionnels.

item.title: Report reveals that OpenAI's GPT-5.2 model cites Grokipedia
item.description: OpenAI may have called GPT-5.2 its "most advanced frontier model for professional work," but tests conducted by the Guardian cast doubt on its credibility. According to the report, OpenAI's GPT-5.2 model cited Grokipedia, the online encyclopedia powered by xAI, when it came to specific, but controversial topics related to Iran or the Holocaust. As seen in the Guardian's report, ChatGPT used Grokipedia as a source for claims about the Iranian government being tied to telecommunications company MTN-Irancell and questions related to Richard Evans, a British historian who served as an expert witne...

item.title: 'Tesla's chip game is no joke': Elon Musk confirms it has restarted work on its biggest supercomputer yet - but what will it actually be used for?
item.description: Tesla restarts Dojo 3 with AI5-AI7 chips, aiming to power autonomous vehicles, humanoid robots, data centers, and space-based AI compute.
